## World map

```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=7}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

pd <- fhimaps::world_map

q <- ggplot(mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group))
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = pd, color = "black", fill="white", size=0.1)
q <- q + theme_void()
q <- q + coord_map(
  projection = "cylequalarea",
  xlim = c(-180,180),
  ylim = c(-70,90),
  orientation = c(90,0,0),
  parameters = list(lat0=90)
)
q <- q + labs(title="World map")
q <- q + labs(caption="\u00A9 EuroGeographics for the administrative boundaries")
q
```

```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=7}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

pd <- fhimaps::world_map

q <- ggplot(mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group))
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = pd, color = "black", fill = "lightgrey", size=0.1)
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = pd[iso3_un195=="DISPUTED"], color = "black", fill="red", size=0.1)
q <- q + theme_void()
q <- q + coord_map(
  projection = "cylequalarea",
  xlim = c(-180,180),
  ylim = c(-70,90),
  orientation = c(90,0,0),
  parameters = list(lat0=90)
)
q <- q + labs(title="Disputed areas")
q <- q + labs(caption="\u00A9 EuroGeographics for the administrative boundaries")
q
```

## Split Maps Without Inserts

```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=7}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

pd <- fhimaps::norway_map_split_counties_b2020

q <- ggplot()
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = pd, aes( x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill=location_code), color="black", size=0.1)
q <- q + theme_void()
q <- q + coord_quickmap()
q <- q + labs(title = "Split map of norwegian counties with 2020 borders and no insert")
q
```

## County Maps With Inserts

```{r fig.height=7, fig.width=7}
library(ggplot2)
library(data.table)

pd <- fhimaps::norway_map_counties_with_insert_b2020

q <- ggplot()
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = pd, aes( x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill=location_code), color="black", size=0.1)
q <- q + annotate(
  "text", 
  x = fhimaps::norway_map_insert_title_position_b2020$long, 
  y = fhimaps::norway_map_insert_title_position_b2020$lat,
  label = "Oslo"
  )
q <- q + theme_void()
q <- q + coord_quickmap()
q <- q + labs(title = "Norwegian counties with 2020 borders and an insert for Oslo")
q
```
